import { memo, useState } from 'react' import { useLocation } from 'react-router-dom' import { AiOutlineSearch } from 'react-icons/ai' import './ListBookingTable.scss' import { english, vietnamese } from '../../Languages/ListBookingTable' function ListBookingTable({ languageSelected }) { //id tour const id = useLocation().state.id //ngay bat dau muon kiem tra const startDate = useLocation().state.startDate const [searchName, setSearchName] = useState('') const languageList = languageSelected === 'EN' ? english : vietnamese const [booking, setBooking] = useState([ { emailAccount: 'abc@gmail.com', fullName: 'Nguyen Van A', numberOfAdult: 5, numberOfChildren: 10, emailContact: 'xyz@gmail.com', phoneContact: '0987654321', request: 'ahfasdkjf' }, { emailAccount: 'abc@gmail.com', fullName: 'Nguyen Van A', numberOfAdult: 5, numberOfChildren: 10, emailContact: 'xyz@gmail.com', phoneContact: '0987654321', request: 'ahfasdkjf' }, { emailAccount: 'abc@gmail.com', fullName: 'Nguyen Van A', numberOfAdult: 5, numberOfChildren: 10, emailContact: 'xyz@gmail.com', phoneContact: '0987654321', request: 'ahfasdkjf' }, { emailAccount: 'abc@gmail.com', fullName: 'Nguyen Van A', numberOfAdult: 5, numberOfChildren: 10, emailContact: 'xyz@gmail.com', phoneContact: '0987654321', request: 'ahfasdkjf' } ]) return (
{booking.map((item, index) => ( ))}
# {languageList.txtEmailAccount} {languageList.txtFullName} {languageList.txtNumberOfPeople} {languageList.txtAction}
{index + 1} {item.emailAccount} {item.fullName} {`${item.numberOfAdult} ${languageList.txtAdult}, ${item.numberOfChildren} ${languageList.txtChildren}`} {languageList.txtViewDetail}
) } export default memo(ListBookingTable)
